ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I could be mistaken, but I don t think you can buff charmed pets.  Even if you can - a LOT of the standard monster rules are suspended for the monster
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:31 AM 11/8/2001 -0300, you wrote:
>Here is an interesting thing to think about. I have a Higher lvl enchanter
>on a PvP server. My brother logs on as a monster in and tells me (we are in
>the same house) what zone he is in. I find him, charm him and then buff him
>to no end. Wait till charm wears off and watch him go rabid on unsuspecting
>newbies. Sounds like it could be a problem to me.

I could be mistaken, but I don't think you can buff charmed pets. Even if
you can - a LOT of the "standard" monster rules are suspended for the
monster class. For example, you can't give them a weapon. Like Atonal
pointed out, there's also a serious lack of "survivability." And
ultimately, if (god forbid) someone went to the great trouble to do this -
remember, it's a PVP okay server. In other words, this falls under the
"appropriate" guidelines.

Talies
